reviews.subject: CS101: Introduction to Programming
reviews.review: Excellent professor with clear and concise lectures. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: MATH150: Calculus I
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and approachable, but the exams are tough.

reviews.subject: HIST101: World History I
reviews.review: Interesting lectures but heavy reading load.

reviews.subject: PHYS101: General Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Lee explains complex concepts very clearly. Great professor!

reviews.subject: CHEM101: General Chemistry
reviews.review: Good teacher, but the lab work is intense.

reviews.subject: PSY101: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging and insightful lectures. Participation is encouraged.

reviews.subject: BIO101: Introduction to Biology
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Harris is very helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: ENGL101: English Composition
reviews.review: Great professor who provides detailed feedback on essays.

reviews.subject: ECON101: Principles of Economics
reviews.review: Lectures are dry and hard to follow. Exams are difficult.

reviews.subject: SOC101: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting and relevant topics. Dr. Lewis makes the class enjoyable.

reviews.subject: PHIL101: Introduction to Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures, but the grading is tough.

reviews.subject: ART101: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate about art and very knowledgeable. A must-take course!

reviews.subject: MATH250: Linear Algebra
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding course. Dr. Walker is an excellent teacher.

reviews.subject: CS201: Algorithms
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson's explanations are top-notch. Best CS course I've taken.

reviews.subject: HIST202: American History
reviews.review: Interesting content, but the lectures can be monotonous.

reviews.subject: PSY201: Developmental Psychology
reviews.review: Great professor, but make sure to keep up with the readings.

reviews.subject: CHEM202: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Extremely difficult course. Dr. Allen is knowledgeable but not the best at explaining.

reviews.subject: BIO202: Genetics
reviews.review: Interesting material and Dr. Scott is very passionate about the subject.

reviews.subject: MATH350: Differential Equations
reviews.review: One of the best math professors. Explains complex topics clearly.

reviews.subject: ENGL202: American Literature
reviews.review: Engaging discussions and well-structured lectures.
